Html:
While coding in the editor I (seemingly) randomly lose intellisense on my external module imports with the error: "The name 'x' does not exist in the current scope". If I close the file and re-open in then I usually get intellisense back. I'm running 0.8.3.1.

Thanks,
Chris

Do you have a small(-ish) example that exhibits this issue? I haven't seen it before.

Also, for bug reports, please feel free to file an issue in the issue tracker directly.
